course.subject: SEC
course.title: Capstone
course.catalogDescription: To continue on the experiment results and preliminary conclusions drawn in the master thesis proposal, students will take this course to complete their master thesis. The deliverable of this course is a master thesis in a publishable quality. This course can be taken for multiple times for credits.

objectives.objective: To continue the progress on the master thesis based on the plan laid out in the master thesis proposal
To iteratively refine the solution proposed in their proposals based on experimental results

outline.topic: Driving the refinement of hypotheses, research questions, and designs based on experimental results
Drawing conclusions from final experiment results
Writing research papers in a publishable quality
